ing: 1 (15 ounce) can cream of coconut (such as Coco LopezÂ®)
1 cup ice cubes, or as desired
des: "I like making non-alcoholic pina coladas, but I wanted to try something new."
ins: Combine cream of coconut, pineapple, orange juice, orange zest, lime juice, lime zest, and vanilla extract in a blender; add ice and blend until smooth.
